name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Experience immersive sound with these wireless Bluetooth headphones. Long-lasting battery life, comfortable fit, and deep bass make them perfect for daily use and travel. Compatible with all major devices.

name: Smart Digital Wrist Watch
description: Track your fitness, steps, heart rate, and sleep with this stylish digital smartwatch. Durable build with water resistance and customizable watch faces for every mood.

name: Non-stick Cookware Set
description: Premium non-stick cookware set with heat-resistant handles and durable coating. Ideal for gas and induction cooking. Easy to clean and designed for everyday kitchen use.

name: Men's Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and comfortable men's running shoes designed for everyday wear. Breathable mesh fabric with durable sole ensures excellent grip and comfort during workouts.

name: Modern LED Floor Lamp
description: Sleek and modern LED floor lamp with adjustable brightness settings. Adds elegance to any room while saving energy. Ideal for bedrooms and living spaces.

name: Decorative Wall Mirror
description: Elegant wall mirror with gold frame, perfect for enhancing your home d√©cor. Adds brightness and depth to any room with a touch of luxury.
